title: Need help! I need help Looking for a good PC or laptop for LoL?
body: Hey just looking for a decent computer/laptop for 300-350, wanting to know some different products and the fps rates they will be at thanks would really appreciate it. :)

replies.body: You can play it with just about anything with a graphic card lol
just play league of legends on the computers in school man. {{summoner:6}}

I used one quite similar to[ this laptop](https://www.gumtree.com.au/s-ad/cooks-hill/laptops/toshiba-p840-i7-touch-screen-excellent-condition-500-firm/1150253788), exact same though it was i5 core instead of i7, ran league at 140 fps. though it costs $500 (as his asking price), but it does have 1TB ram, i7, 8gb ram, and itsw one of the better toshiba mousepads and quite responsive. Its wireless also isnt too bad as long as you dont have numerous obsticals, usually averaged at 18-27 ping, its 14" display at a standard 1366x768 display, though its picture quality is quite decent considering. Could also run quite a lot of higher end games, as in can run witcher at 10 fps.
